price: 10 Ton Seigneur appela un jour Moïse : « Va trouver le peuple impie,
arabic: وَإِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئۡتِ ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-idh nādā rabbuka mūsā ani i'ti al-qawma al-ẓālimīna
